metadata.title: CVE-2014-3613 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
cURL and libcurl before 7.38.0 does not properly handle IP addresses incookie domain names, which allows remote attackers to set cookies for orsend arbitrary cookies to certain sites, as demonstrated by a site at192.168.0.1 setting cookies for a site at 127.168.0.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3613` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3 - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-nss - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.35.0-1ubuntu2.1').
